alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 6:23PM CDT until August 18 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Adams County in south central Nebraska... Eastern Kearney County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 623 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Gibbon, or 10 miles east of Kearney, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Heartwell around 640 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Minden and Norman. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 277 and 286. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This thunderstorm is capable of producing all types of severe weather including extremely large hail, destructive straight line winds and tornadoes. Move quickly to a safe shelter such as an interior room, a bathroom, closet or basement.
